resources.string:
"For all paranoid people here are people some explications 

"
"This App nether send your password to a database, in fact your password never leave the app!." "We take your password and put it in a function call Hash Function (SHA1), this function give " "us back an unique set of 40 characters like those : 

" "cf23df2207d99a74fbe169e3eba035e633b65d94 


 " "Then we take the first 5 characters and we send them to the database of haveibeenpwned.com " "and thy give us back a list of all the 35 last characters, and their occurrence in the " "database, with the same 5 first characters corresponding to our hash function.
" "With this method you can put safely your password in this app and it will never be at risk! " "

"
"This application is powered by Have I Been Pwned" "(haveibeenpwned.com)

"
